1-1.original: מִזְמוֹר לְדָוִד יְהוָה רֹעִי לֹא אֶחְסָר
1-1.kjv: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
1-1.esv: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
1-1.amplified: The LORD is my Shepherd [to feed, to guide, and to shield me], I shall not lack [anything].
notes: H3068 YHWH - The divine name, often translated LORD (all caps)
H7462 ra'ah - to shepherd, tend, feed. David the shepherd knew this intimately.
